title: EVENTS – hololive（ホロライブ）公式サイト

items.title: hololive Indonesia 5th Anniversary LIVE Chromatic Future
items.author: narita
items.content:
November 15-16, 2025 ICE BSD Tangerang

Welcome to hololive Indonesia 5th Anniversary LIVE

Join us as we celebrate five dazzling years of hololive Indonesia at their spectacular anniversary concert, “hololive Indonesia 5th Anniversary LIVE

Get ready for an electrifying night where all hololive Indonesia talents unite on stage for their

very first concert — bringing you a whirlwind of music,

energy, and unforgettable moments you’ll treasure forever.

Let’s come together, fill the hall with cheers, and step boldly into a future bursting with color, energy,

and endless possibilities.

Saturday, November 15, 2025 (WIB) Event starts at 7:00 PM

COMIC FRONTIER 21 ICE BSD Hall 6

Jl. BSD Grand Boulevard No.1, Pagedangan, Kec. Pagedangan, Kabupaten Tangerang, Banten 15339, Indonesia

How to get there

Stay tuned for ticket prices, seating categories, and purchase information, available soon!

Celebrate the moment with exclusive Chromatic Future merchandise, available only during the event. Stay tuned and don’t miss out!

Celebrate 5 Years of Dreams

hololive Indonesia has grown with you for five incredible years!

Now it’s time to look ahead to a brighter and

colorful future together.

Let’s make Chromatic Future an event to remember!

Follow hololive Indonesia for updates
